title: On The Debate: Danny Murphy, Gary Rowett and Dennis Wise
description: Join us for The Debate this week as our guests tackle the big football talking points.
content:
David Prutton will be in the hot-seat on Monday, with guests Danny Murphy, Henry Winter and Christian Purslow.
Scott Minto will then be presenting as he's joined by Liam Rosenior and Craig Bellamy on Tuesday, before Geoff Shreeves takes the hot-seat, with Ian Wright and Dennis Wise on Wednesday, and Tim Sherwood on Thursday.
Monday 8th
Tuesday 9th
Wednesday 10th
Thursday 11th
Friday 12th
Watch The Debate at 10pm on Sky Sports Premier League.
